list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, toString(id) AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, argMax(commits_count, computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily WHERE repo_id = toUUID('${repo_id}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day ORDER BY day

SELECT day AS time, argMax(prs_merged, computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily WHERE repo_id = toUUID('${repo_id}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day ORDER BY day
